iata:moveSequenceNo.description: Contains the incremental number that identifies the sequence

iata:moveType.description: Indicates the code of the Mode of Transport Used if it relates to Pre-Carriage, Main-Carriage or On-Carriage. Always defaults to Main-Carriage.

iata:moveModeCode.description: Code of the Mode of Transport. UNECE Recommendation N. 19 - Code for Modes of Transport can be used

iata:moveCarrierName.description: Name of the Mean of Transport (e.g. Carrier name)

iata:moveLineNo.description: Line number for other means of transport

iata:moveTransportEquipmentID.description: Contains identification number (e.g. vehicle registration number)

iata:moveTransportEquipmentType.description: Contains the type of the Container or Vehicle. United Nations Directories for Electronic Data Interchange Code List can be used.

iata:moveTransportEquipmentSize.description: Describes the size of the Container or Vehicle. Free Text

iata:moveSpaceAllocationDetails.description: Coded indication of the action requested, taken or confirmed related to space allocation

iata:moveAllotmentDetails.description: Reference assigned to Guaranteed Capacity on one or more specific flight on specific date to third parties such as Agents and Other Airlines

iata:moveExceptionHandlingDetails.description: Code indicating the reason of exceptional business practices and rules

iata:moveLoadingDateTime.description: Date at which goods are loaded onto the means of transport being used for their carriage.

iata:moveDepartureDateTime.description: Date at which goods are departing onto the means of transport being used for their carriage

iata:moveArrivalDateTime.description: Date at which goods are arriving from the means of transport having been used for their carriage

iata:moveUnloadingDateTime.description: Date at which goods are unloaded from the means of transport having been used for their carriage.
